body.name: MRGLAS USB A to USB C Cable 3.2A 2-Pack [90°, Gold-Plated] 6.6+6.6FT Type C Charger Right Angle Nylon Braided Fast Charging Cable Compatible with Galaxy S10 S9 Plus S21 Note 10 LG - Purple
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 10 hrs 46 mins
features: ❤️[Lifetime Warranty] We’re so confident in our usb c charger cable, we are offering a hassle-free replacement for all quality issues. Not for half a year, not for 18 months, but for an entire lifetime. It’s the only cable you will ever need to buy. We provide this 2-pack 3.2A premium nylon-braided usb c charger cable right angle (6.6ft+6.6ft).

⚡[Certified 3.2a Dual chip Fast Charging] MRGLAS 3.2A USB C fast charging cable is 2x faster than other cables with 3.1A, Mrglas usb c fast charging cable with gold-plated design avoids energy loss than other cables, and it has a transfer speed of up to 480Mbps. With a data transfer rate of up to 480Mbps between two devices, this USB-C connection can download 100 songs every 5 seconds.

👑[Upgraded Exclusive Right Angle Design] MRGLAS USB C cable with an innovative 90 degrees " L " design. It can lessen stress on cords and your phone's USB-C port, effectively avoid the bending of the cord end and extend the life of the charging cable. It's user-friendly design more convenient and comfortable for playing games, watching videos, reading e-books when you charging. [Note: Compatible with all phone cases]

💎[Upgraded Gold-plated & Officially Certified] MRGLAS usb to usb c cable with gold-plated design avoids energy loss than other cables,The gold-plated plug has rustless & anti-corrosion, the gold-plated cable service life 3x than others. This USB C charger fast charging cable has an gold-plated head that complies with the corresponding standards of electronic safety certification.

💎[Military-grade Nylon Braided Material] USB Type C Cable is joined with strong military nylon braided fiber, which is the most flexible, most robust, and most durable material in existence. which improves tensile force by 300% and features a unique stress relief support design that can endure 100,000+ bend tests, It's durable enough to be used as a pull rope for cars,The flexible and durable double-braided nylon C charger cable fast charging lasts longer and never breaks.
⚡[Universal Compatibility] USB Charger Cable can fast charge and sync well compatible with Galaxy S20/S20+ Ultra S10 S10E S9 S8 Note 10 9 8, Moto Z/Z2, LG G5/G6/V20/V30 and other USB-C devices.

Not for half a year, not for 18 months, but for an entire lifetime. It’s the only cable you will ever need to buy. 10X Military Grade Durable: USB Type C Cable is joined with strong military nylon braided fiber, which is the most flexible, most robust, and most durable material in existence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They work terrific. I have an older Samsung S10+ and these cables are fantastic. Especially for fast charging! Well made and function terrific! When plugged in charging, I like that the fact that the bottom connector to the phone is side ways. I can rest on my lap or portable desk table and not have to wonder about the connector bending or braking. These are the Cadillac of charging cables. I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect even over the OEM factory cords. Acquired for the new 15 Iphone and works excellent, easy to plug in and out, fits everywhere in the car and an overall hi quality cable and cool design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable, sturdy, and a great variety of sizes included
reviews.reviewText: I've bought this set twice now, because my husband and I like it so much. Why two sets then, I hear you asking. Well, oopsie, we left one in a hotel room. We now have at least one in each laptop back, our vehicles, and next to our recliners. These cords have stood up to a-hole cats trying to use them as chew toys, and to a very noisy day when the still plugged in cord dangled outside our passenger door. Not a skosh of damage to any cord. Worth the bit of extra money, and the right angle makes charging while using the phone a breeze!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product, but doesn't work in my car.
reviews.reviewText: Not compatible with Android Auto in the car. Works great the house.REQUIRES a fast charging plug in order to use. WILL NOT WORK with a regular charging plug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made product.
reviews.reviewText: The fittings are nice and tight. Charges fast on my Samsung phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unfortunately doesn't fast charge
reviews.reviewText: With my phone charger cable + a 20k power bank my quest 3 would charge while playing. wanted to like this charger but it was slowly draining my battery instead of charging while playing. better for phones, not quest 3.update: 5 star for customer service, didn't expect a refund offer but the seller messaged me right away and offered one. thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have to say I'm amazed with the Quality of this Item, and It does support Fast Charging,Cord feels super reinforced, and both Regular USB plug and type C feel well made!Ordered 10 ft.Thanks for great Item, and will buy again.Fast shipping as well for Overseas, ordered on 01/22/24 and got it on 01/29/24.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Can't speak to durability as just bought them. Perfect for the Samsung tablet. The right angle along with the space between the connector and the right angle cable makes it perfect even with a somewhat thick case and with a stand. Several other right angle cables didn't have the space between the connector and the cable and would not have worked with either the case or the stand. No trouble connecting with fast charger and also a slow charger in the office - both work perfectly. The variety of cord lengths make it easier to tidy up the desk space by using a cord of the needed length without having extra cord getting in the way. Will update in the future if any issues. So far they're perfect.

I recently made a repeat purchase of these cables, as I found myself needing more for various locations such as work, camp, school, and home. Once again, I couldn't be more pleased with these cables.They are not only sturdy but also crafted with great care and exceptional quality. These cables are exactly the length they claim to be, which is a refreshing change from some products that fall short on their promises.The charging power of these cables is truly remarkable. They deliver a reliable and efficient charge every time. If you're in need of a set of cables in various lengths that you can trust to perform consistently, these are the ones to go for. They've certainly become my go-to choice for charging cables. Highly recommended!
Das Kabel funktioniert, fühlt sich stabil an, alles bestens

Bought these hoping that they would actually work at being a fast charger to use with my power bank while at work I work in the medical field and can't just leave my phone plugged into a wall outlet as myself and my coworkers communicate through our phones and calls/texts Esperanto if there is an emergency situation so can't be in a different part or different floor than where my phone is plugged in charging and doing 12 hour shifts my phone tends to start getting a low battery little over half way through the shift so having a cable that does actually work and does actually fast charge my phone with my portable power bank is something that I needed and these cables came in an assortment of lengths which I wanted as I love long cables but the short cable are great for use woth power bank as it works perfect with having the power bank and my phone that is connected to the cable in my scrub pockets without feeling like too much in my pocket and with longer cables previously it wouldn't fit properly and couldn't walk around with my phone charging in my pocket due to the awkwardness but these cables for the price point exceeded my expectations especially compared to past experiences with other cables that claim to be fast charging but don't actually fast charge even when used in a wall outlet with a "fast charging charging block" would always get a message about the cable but these are totally worth the price and the assortment of lengths are great aswell!! As sometimes it's nice to have a short cable for people like myself using a power bank and when using a wall outlet at home the 6.6 and 10ft cables are great as my currently apartment doesn't have many outlets so the long length is great and i love the right angle as it doesn't feel awkward and works great and actually works with my phone case aswell!! Definitely recommend 10000%
Lädt schnell und erfüllt zu 100% seinen Zweck
Angle connector prevent wires from breaking.Devices charge fairly quick, i do find longer cord is slower devices charge, but overall quality is good
